titleStmt.title: [Here endeth ye hystorye of Olyuer of Castylle, and of the fayre Helayne]
Ye hystorye of Olyver of Castylle, and of the fayre Helayne.
titleStmt.author: Watson, Henry, fl. 1500-1518.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the sonne by wynkyn de worde,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of oure lorde. M.CCCCC. and xviij. [1518]]

notesStmt.note: Title and imprint from colophon; colophon begins "Here endeth ye hystorye of Olyuer of Castylle, and of the fayre Helayne".
Reproduction of original in the Pierpont Morgan Library, New York City.
